thread.title: On the Air

title: On the Air
text:
Published October 10. 2015 12:01AM 
Auto Racing 
8 a.m., NBCSN — Formula One Russian Grand Prix qualifying from Sochi, Russia. 
7:15 p.m., Chs. 10, 30 — NASCAR Sprint Cup Bank of America 500 from Concord, N.C. 
Baseball 
5:30 p.m., TBS — NLDS: Chicago Cubs at St. Louis Cardinals in Game 2. 
9 p.m., TBS, WOR (710-AM) — NLDS: New York Mets at Los Angeles Dodgers in Game 2. 
Boxing 
8 p.m., NBCSN — Danny O'Connor vs. Gabriel Bracero in a welterweight bout from Lowell, Mass. 
Football 
Noon, Ch. 8 — NCAA: Oklahoma at Texas. 
Noon, ESPN — NCAA: Indiana at Penn State. 
Noon, ESPN2 — NCAA: Illinois at Iowa. 
Noon, ESPNU — NCAA: Tulane at Temple. 
Noon, FS1 — NCAA: Baylor at Kansas. 
Noon, SNY — NCAA: Williams & Mary at Villanova. 
Noon, CSN — NCAA: Harvard at Cornell. 
12:30 p.m., WCCT — NCAA: Virginia at Pittsburgh. 
3 p.m., YES, NESN — NCAA: Wake Forest at Boston College. 
3 p.m., SNY — NCAA: James Madison at Towson. 
3:30 p.m., Ch. 3 — NCAA: Georgia at Tennessee. 
3:30 p.m., Ch. 8 — NCAA: Georgia Tech at Clemson. 
3:30 p.m., Chs. 10, 30 — NCAA: Navy at Notre Dame. 
3:30 p.m., ESPN — NCAA: South Carolina at Louisiana State. 
3:30 p.m., ESPN2 — NCAA: Wisconsin at Nebraska. 
3:30 p.m., ESPNU — NCAA: Minnesota at Purdue. 
3:45 p.m., ESPNEWS, WTIC (1080-AM) — NCAA: UConn at Central Florida. 
4 p.m., FS1 — NCAA: Oregon State at Arizona. 
7 p.m., ESPN — NCAA: Arkansas at Alabama. 
7 p.m., ESPN2 — NCAA: Oklahoma State at West Virginia. 
7:30 p.m., Ch. 61 — NCAA: Texas Christian at Kansas State. 
7:30 p.m., ESPNU — NCAA: East Carolina at Brigham Young. 
8 p.m., Ch. 8 — NCAA: Miami at Florida State. 
10 p.m., ESPN — NCAA: California at Utah. 
10:15 p.m., ESPN2 — NCAA: Wyoming at Air Force. 
Golf 
8 a.m., Golf Channel — European PGA: British Masters from Buckinghamshire, England. 
11 a.m., Golf Channel — LPGA: Sime Darby from Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. (taped today) 
Noon, Chs. 10, 30 — Presidents Cup from Incheon City, South Korea. (taped today) 
1 p.m., Golf Channel — Champions: SAS Championship from Cary, N.C. 
9:30 p.m., Golf Channel — Presidents Cup from Incheon City, South Korea. 
Hockey 
7 p.m., NESN — NHL: Montreal Canadiens at Boston Bruins. 
7:05 p.m., WFAN (660-AM) — NHL: New Jersey Devils at Washington Capitals. 
Motorcycle Racing 
1 a.m. (Sunday), FS1 — FIM MotoGP: Motul Grand Prix of Japan from Motegi. 
Soccer
